name: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF CHILDREN'S HOSPITALS
description: National trade association representing childrens hospitals
sampleDescriptions: Monitor H.R.5376, Build Back Better Act, for issues related to childrens mental and behavioral health, State Childrens Health Insurance Program, CHGME, maternal and new born health. Educate policymake
Monitor H.R.5376, Build Back Better Act for policies to improve childrens Medicaid.
